name: Land of Cowboys
description:
PLEASE PLAY FULL SCREEN 

Bring your favorite Cowboys -Amigo, Blondie, Angel Eyes to life in a thrilling rougelike action packed adventure in Pixelated Land of Cowboys. With unique Western feel, play two unique levels to defeat the final boss. Shoot your way to victory.

Controls - ASDW or Arrow Keys to Move player

Click or Hold Left Mouse Button to Shoot
